goal:
The Confederation of Danish Industry (DI) is the largest Danish business organisation. Our headquarters are based in Copenhagen. DI's membership currently comprises 10.000 private enterprises within the manufacturing, transport, energy, trade and service industry, as well as IT, foodstuffs and consultancy. Furthermore, a number of sectoral employers' associations and branch federations exist within DI's framework. Members of DI be found at: www.di.dk.

DI works to improve the competitiveness of its members and to provide the best possible framework conditions for Danish industry.

- Functioning as the secretariat for the CEO and Board of Directors on certain issues.
- Participating actively in numerous forums in Brussels, e.g. in BUSINESSEUROPE and the European Economic and Social Committee, where DI holds a seat in Group 1.
